data.field: send - send a message over a socket

Sends a message on a socket. Takes the same flags as the system call of the same name. On unconnected sockets you must specify a destination to send TO, in which case it does a C sendto(). Returns the number of characters sent, or the undefined value if there is an error. See [%linkNodeTitle "perlman:perlipc|UDP: Message Passing", $NODE, "UDP: Message Passing",{anchor=>"UDP_Message_Passing"};%] for examples.
